title: Gladiator 2
description: Set years after the original, the film follows Lucius, the son of Lucilla and nephew of Commodus. Inspired by the legacy of Maximus, Lucius has been living in the wilderness, having forsaken his noble birthright. However, a series of events brings him back into the orbit of Rome, which is now co-ruled by emperors Geta and Caracalla. Lucius is drawn into the brutal world of the arena, forcing him to confront his past and fight for his own vision of Rome.
tagline: What we do in life echoes in eternity.

title: Barbie
description: "Stereotypical Barbie" lives a perfect life in the matriarchal Barbie Land, until she begins to experience an existential crisis, plagued by thoughts of death and developing flat feet. To cure her afflictions, she is instructed to travel to the real world to find the child playing with her. Ken stows away, and upon arriving in Los Angeles, they discover a patriarchal society that challenges their entire worldview, leading Ken to bring patriarchy back to Barbie Land and forcing Barbie to fight to restore her home.

title: Joker: Folie à Deux
description: Following the events of the first film, Arthur Fleck is now incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. There, he encounters Harleen Quinzel, another patient with her own complex past and delusions. A dark, musical-infused romance blossoms between them, built on their shared madness. Their "folie à deux" (a madness shared by two) inspires them to plot a chaotic escape and unleash a new wave of mayhem on Gotham City.

title: Wicked
description: Set in the Land of Oz long before Dorothy arrives, the story follows Elphaba, a young woman with emerald-green skin who is misunderstood and ostracized. She arrives at Shiz University, where she forms an unlikely friendship with the popular and bubbly Galinda. The film explores their complex relationship and the divergent paths they take—one becoming the Wicked Witch of the West, the other Glinda the Good—as they navigate the corrupt government of the Wonderful Wizard of Oz.
tagline: Everyone deserves a chance to fly.

title: Moana 2
description: Three years after her first voyage, Moana receives an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors. She learns of a lost, legendary island named Motufetu, which once connected all the islands, but was sunk by the vengeful storm god Nalo. To break the curse and reconnect her people, Moana assembles a new crew and reunites with Maui for an expansive and dangerous new voyage into the far seas of Oceania.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: The film follows Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen people of the desert planet Arrakis. On a path of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family, Paul is forced to choose between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe. He endeavors to prevent a terrible future that only he can foresee, all while contending with the rising power of House Harkonnen and the political manipulations of the Emperor.

title: Oppenheimer
description: This biographical epic follows the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the theoretical physicist who headed the Los Alamos Laboratory during the Manhattan Project. The film, split across different timelines, details his early academic life, his leadership in the race to build the first atomic bomb, and the moral and political fallout he faced after the war, culminating in his 1954 security clearance hearing where his loyalty to the United States was questioned.

title: Inside Out 2
description: The story returns to the mind of Riley, who is now a teenager. Headquarters undergoes a sudden demolition to make room for something entirely unexpected: new Emotions. Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, and Disgust, who’ve long been running a successful operation, aren't sure how to feel when Anxiety shows up. And it looks like she’s not alone, as Embarrassment, Ennui, and Envy soon join, throwing Riley's sense of self into chaos during a pivotal weekend hockey camp.
tagline: A head full of new emotions.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Wade Wilson, who has been grappling with his failures, is pulled from his quiet life by the Time Variance Authority (TVA). The TVA informs him that his universe is in danger and recruits him for a mission to save the Sacred Timeline. He is partnered with a reluctant and broken variant of Wolverine, who is grieving the loss of his own world. The two must overcome their clashing personalities to work together and stop Cassandra Nova, a powerful new threat, from destroying the multiverse.
tagline: They're not happy to be stuck...

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
description: This prequel follows the origin story of Imperator Furiosa. Snatched from the "Green Place of Many Mothers" as a child, she falls into the hands of a great Biker Horde led by the Warlord Dementus. As they sweep through the Wasteland, they come across the Citadel, presided over by Immortan Joe. Furiosa is forced to survive as the two tyrants war for dominance, all while she plots her escape and seeks a way back home.
tagline: The world falls, but she rises.

title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
description: Set many generations after the death of Caesar, apes are now the dominant species, and humans have regressed to a feral, primitive state. A young ape named Noa, from a peaceful falconry clan, has his village destroyed and his clan enslaved by Proximus Caesar, a tyrannical ape leader twisting Caesar's teachings. Noa embarks on a harrowing journey with a young human woman named Mae to rescue his family and challenge Proximus's new empire.

title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
description: Kong, now residing in the Hollow Earth, senses a new threat. This leads to the discovery of a hidden civilization of Great Apes ruled by the tyrannical Skar King. The Skar King, wielding an ancient ice-powered Titan named Shimo, plans to conquer both the Hollow Earth and the surface world. Godzilla, sensing the threat, emerges to help. The two titans, along with a revived Mothra, must form an uneasy alliance to stop the Skar King and save both their worlds.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales reunites with Gwen Stacy and is catapulted across the multiverse, where he encounters the Spider-Society, a team of Spider-People led by Miguel O'Hara (Spider-Man 2099). Miles comes into conflict with Miguel over how to handle a new villain, the Spot, whose powers threaten to unravel the multiverse. When Miles is forced to choose between saving one person he loves and saving every universe, he must redefine what it means to be a hero.
tagline: It's how you wear the mask.

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: to track down a terrifying new weapon before it falls into the wrong hands. The weapon is a sentient, rogue AI known as "the Entity," which threatens all of humanity. Ethan is confronted by Gabriel, a figure from his pre-IMF past who acts as the Entity's human emissary. The mission becomes a globe-trotting race where the fate of the world, and the lives of those he cares about, are at stake.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The Guardians' lives on Knowhere are shattered when Rocket is critically injured by an attack from Adam Warlock. To save him, the team must embark on a dangerous mission into Rocket's traumatic past. They confront his creator, the obsessive and cruel High Evolutionary, who is seeking to "perfect" the universe. The mission tests the team's bonds as they fight to save their friend and confront the dark origins that shaped him.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, he must face a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe. The Marquis de Gramont is given full control to hunt Wick down, destroying the New York Continental and enlisting Wick's old friend, the blind assassin Caine. John travels from New York to Osaka and Paris, fighting for his life in a final bid to challenge the Marquis to a duel and win his freedom.

title: A Quiet Place: Day One
description: Set before the events of the first two films, the story follows Sam, a woman in New York City on the day the blind, sound-hunting alien creatures arrive. As the city descends into chaos, she reluctantly teams up with another survivor named Eric. Together, with Sam's cat, Frodo, they must navigate the collapsing metropolis in silence, attempting to find a way to safety while witnessing the world's end.

title: Wonka
description: This musical prequel follows a young and optimistic Willy Wonka as he arrives in a new city, armed only with a hatful of dreams and a passion for chocolate. He aims to open a shop in the prestigious "Galeries Gourmet," but is immediately thwarted by the "Chocolate Cartel" (Slugworth, Prodnose, and Fickelgruber) and tricked into indentured servitude by the devious Mrs. Scrubitt. With the help of a young orphan named Noodle and other friends, Willy uses his inventive magic to expose the cartel and share his chocolate with the world.
tagline: Every good thing in this world...

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Set more than a decade after the first film, Jake Sully and Neytiri have built a family on Pandora. Their peaceful life is shattered when the "Sky People" (humans) return, this time with a new city and a new objective. Colonel Quaritch is resurrected in a Na'vi avatar body, leading a mission to hunt down Jake. To protect their family, Jake and Neytiri flee their forest home and seek refuge with the Metkayina, a clan of reef-dwelling Na'vi, forcing them to learn the "way of water."

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
description: Brooklyn plumbers and brothers Mario and Luigi are working on a major water main leak when they are sucked into a mysterious pipe, transporting them to another world. They are separated: Mario lands in the vibrant Mushroom Kingdom, ruled by Princess Peach, while Luigi is captured and taken to the Dark Lands, ruled by the evil Koopa king, Bowser. Mario must team up with Peach and Toad to learn the rules of this new world, rescue his brother, and stop Bowser's plan to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom.
